statements: SELECT attendee_id, attendee_name FROM EventAttendees;
SELECT event_id, attendee_name, registration_date FROM EventAttendees;
SELECT * FROM EventAttendees WHERE ticket_type = 'VIP';
SELECT attendee_id, event_id, attendee_name, registration_date FROM EventAttendees ORDER BY attendee_id DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT event_id FROM EventAttendees ORDER BY event_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM EventAttendees WHERE event_id = 101 AND ticket_type = 'VIP' ORDER BY registration_date DESC
SELECT attendee_name, registration_date, ticket_type FROM EventAttendees WHERE attendee_id = 1 AND event_id = 101
SELECT attendee_id, COUNT(*) as total_attendees FROM EventAttendees GROUP BY attendee_id HAVING total_attendees > 1
SELECT DISTINCT event_id, ticket_type FROM EventAttendees ORDER BY event_id ASC, ticket_type DESC
SELECT * FROM EventAttendees WHERE registration_date BETWEEN '2021-09-01' AND '2022-01-31'
SELECT * FROM attendees;
SELECT name, email, age FROM attendees;
SELECT event_name, event_date, location FROM events;
SELECT * FROM attendees WHERE age > 30;
SELECT name, email, gender FROM attendees WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT * FROM attendees WHERE age > 30;
SELECT name, email FROM attendees WHERE gender = 'Male' ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT event_name, category, location FROM events WHERE event_date >= '2022-06-01' AND event_date <= '2022-06-30';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_attendees FROM attendees;
SELECT DISTINCT gender FROM attendees ORDER BY gender ASC, age DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM Attendees;
SELECT attendee_name, email FROM Attendees;
SELECT event_name, location, event_date FROM Events;
SELECT attendee_id, event_id, behavior_type FROM AttendeeBehavior;
SELECT attendee_name, email, join_date FROM Attendees;
SELECT * FROM Attendees;
SELECT attendee_name, email FROM Attendees WHERE join_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT event_name, location, event_date FROM Events ORDER BY event_date DESC;

SELECT attendee_name, event_name, behavior_type FROM Attendees JOIN AttendeeBehavior ON Attendees.attendee_id = AttendeeBehavior.attendee_id JOIN Events ON AttendeeBehavior.event_id = Events.event_id WHERE behavior_type = 'feedback';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_attendees FROM Attendees;
SELECT * FROM attendees;
SELECT attendee_id, attendee_name, age FROM attendees ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT event_name, location, start_date FROM events WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT a.attendee_id, a.attendee_name, e.event_name FROM attendees a JOIN event_attendance ea ON a.attendee_id = ea.attendee_id JOIN events e ON ea.event_id = e.event_id;
SELECT attendee_name, MAX(age) AS oldest_age FROM attendees GROUP BY attendee_name;
SELECT * FROM attendees WHERE age > 25;
SELECT attendee_name, email FROM attendees WHERE registration_date >= '2022-01-01';

SELECT attendee_name, event_name, location, start_date, end_date FROM attendees JOIN event_attendance ON attendees.attendee_id = event_attendance.attendee_id JOIN events ON event_attendance.event_id = events.event_id;
SELECT attendee_name, behavior_type, behavior_timestamp FROM attendees JOIN attendee_behavior ON attendees.attendee_id = attendee_behavior.attendee_id WHERE behavior_timestamp >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT event_name, COUNT(attendance_id) AS total_attendees FROM events JOIN event_attendance ON events.event_id = event_attendance.event_id GROUP BY event_name ORDER BY total_attendees DESC;
SELECT * FROM Attendees;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM Attendees WHERE attendee_id = 1;
SELECT event_name, start_date, end_date FROM Events ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT attendee_id, event_id, recommendation_text FROM Recommendations WHERE attendee_id = 2 ORDER BY recommendation_id ASC;
SELECT service_name, service_description FROM Services WHERE service_description LIKE '%technology%';
SELECT * FROM Attendees WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM Attendees WHERE phone_number = '+123456789';
SELECT event_name, start_date, location FROM Events WHERE end_date > NOW();
SELECT attendee_id, recommendation_text FROM Recommendations WHERE attendee_id = 1;
SELECT service_name, service_description FROM Services WHERE service_name ILIKE '%database%' ORDER BY service_id DESC;
